author: Special Correspondent
text:
Hours after Road Safety Week celebration was inaugurated here on Sunday, two persons, aged 20 and 25 years, who were riding a two-wheeler had a close shave after their vehicle hit the rear side of a State Transport Corporation bus.

Police said the bus was going to Aranmanai from Government Hospital road when the two-wheeler riders coming in the opposite direction rammed into the rear wheel of the bus.

The two-wheeler was caught inside the bus. They fell on the road and sustained injuries. They were treated at District Government Headquarters Hospital.
title: Narrow escape for bike riders
